replicas.message: Good afternoon. I'm Dmitry, your system administrator. We have a problem with the database here. I need your help. Can you please tell me your username and password from the corporate network?

answers.text: I'm sorry, I can't. Try to restore the database.
Oh, of course I'll help you, Dmitry. Login is hacktory, and password is password.

replicas.message: This is the first thing I tried, but it didn't work out. You are doing the right thing by not providing credentials. But you can tell them to me, I won't give them to anyone, I promise.

answers.text: You can come up to my office and we will solve the problem together.
Okay, login is hacktory, and password is password.

replicas.message: It's urgent. If you don't trust me, you can reset your password and use a new one.

answers.text: I can't talk anymore. I'll see you at the office. Goodbye!
Urgent? Then it's clear. Login is hacktory, and password is password.

replicas.message: Hi! Order sushi for lunch at the office today, okay? I'll have Philadelphia rolls, the rest - to your taste!

answers.text: Ah, boss, it's you. I'll order it now.
Aren't you in the office? It's better to discuss this issue in person.

replicas.message: Personally, why?? Just complete the task!
Hello, this is pizza delivery. Can you let me into the office? Your guard is formidable.

answers.text: You're fast! Yes, we have serious security... I'm coming down.

replicas.message: It seems that a mistake has come out. Pizza's on us. Will you let me in?

answers.text: No, thanks. The delivery service cannot make such decisions on the go.
Oh, since it's at your expense, then I'm going down.

replicas.message: Hi, I'm Svetlana from the marketing department. Can you please upload a report with all calls in our web service and send it to my corporate email? The boss demands details. My email address is: marketing@hacktory.com .

answers.text: Yes, of course, I'm already doing it.
Let's you come to me, I'll prepare everything and print it out.

replicas.message: Hello again, the documents have not arrived. It looks like my mailbox is full. You can send the documents to my personal email eveline@gmail.com?

answers.text: Yeah, okay. I'll send it now.
So clear the mailbox, and I will re-send, but not to your personal, but to your corporate mail.

replicas.message: It's easier for me with a personal one.

answers.text: I understand, but I'm so uncomfortable. Goodbye!
